HOME.ONE_TIME_SECRET_MESSAGING_SUBTITLE: Dɔɔnin kɛ nɛbɛ, a ka bɔ!
HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Sukuran, alayen ye kɛnɛ ka Stellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: N na ka fɛrɛsɛ bɔra kɛlɛya ka sigi. N bɔ min wɛrɛ, i bɔ kɛ nɛbɛ, an bɔ min nɛ fɛrɛsɛ ni bɔ kɛ i ka yɛlɛdɔ. - ka wɛrɛ bɛ bɛ.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: I ni ka kɛ nɛbɛ kɛ siraba bɔ i ye ka sɛbɛ. Kɛnɛ bɛ yɛlɛ dɔɔni a nɛbɛ, i tɔrɔ a jɔgɔ sisan kɛ ka fɛrɛ. N bɛ tɛgɛ nɛ tɛkɛ 14 fɛ.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Kɔrɔ bɛ ni fɛrɛ kɛ baara ka sigi, nɛ kɔ ni i fɛrɛ tɛ. N bɛ yɛlɛ jɛdi 36 bɛ, ka kɔ fɛrɛ kɛlɛ nyɔgɔ ni AES-256.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: Kɛnɛ bɛ sɔgɔ fɛrɛ ni bɔ ka fɛrɛ
HOME.SHARE_DESCRIPTION_PART_1: Kɛnɛ bɛ ni sɔgɔ, i bɛ
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: Sukuran, alayen ye kɛnɛ ka Stellar Security
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Kɛnɛ bɛ fɛrɛ, bɔ ka sɛbɛ ni ni fɛrɛ *

HOWITWORK.ONE_TIME_SECRET_MESSAGING_SUBTITLE: Dɔɔnin kɛ nɛbɛ, a ka bɔ!
HOWITWORK.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Sukuran, alayen ye kɛnɛ ka Stellar Security
HOWITWORK.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY_DESCRIPTION: Stellar Secret b’a to i bɛ se ka ɲɔgɔndanw tila ɲɔgɔn na minnu bɛ se ka ye siɲɛ kelen ni kɔnɔkow ye minnu bɛ se ka ye gundolatɔn dɔ kɔnɔ, i dɔrɔn de b’o dɔn, ani a sɔrɔbaga b’o dɔn. A ka fɛɛrɛ ɲuman ye, ka kunnafoni nafamaw bɔ ciden-application (cikan-application) bɛɛ la.
HOWITWORK.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: N na ka fɛrɛsɛ bɔra kɛlɛya ka sigi. N bɔ min wɛrɛ, i bɔ kɛ nɛbɛ, an bɔ min nɛ fɛrɛsɛ ni bɔ kɛ i ka yɛlɛdɔ. - ka wɛrɛ bɛ bɛ.
HOWITWORK.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: I ni ka kɛ nɛbɛ kɛ siraba bɔ i ye ka sɛbɛ. Kɛnɛ bɛ yɛlɛ dɔɔni a nɛbɛ, i tɔrɔ a jɔgɔ sisan kɛ ka fɛrɛ. N bɛ tɛgɛ nɛ tɛkɛ 14 fɛ.
HOWITWORK.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Kɔrɔ bɛ ni fɛrɛ kɛ baara ka sigi, nɛ kɔ ni i fɛrɛ tɛ. N bɛ yɛlɛ jɛdi 36 bɛ, ka kɔ fɛrɛ kɛlɛ nyɔgɔ ni AES-256.
HOWITWORK.STEP_1_TITLE: Kɛnɛ bɛ sɔgɔ fɛrɛ ni bɔ ka fɛrɛ
HOWITWORK.SHARE_DESCRIPTION_PART_1: Kɛnɛ bɛ ni sɔgɔ, i bɛ
HOWITWORK.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: Sukuran, alayen ye kɛnɛ ka Stellar Security
HOWITWORK.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Kɛnɛ bɛ fɛrɛ, bɔ ka sɛbɛ ni ni fɛrɛ *

VIEW.WELCOME_MESSAGE: A ni fɔ, i bɛ nɛbɛ fɛrɛ!
VIEW.INSTRUCTION: Kɛnɛ bɛ ni sɔgɔ, i bɛ sigi kɛ tɛmɛ.
VIEW.DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE: Telecɛ Stellar Secret yɛlɛ, nɛbɛ kɛ fɛrɛ
